parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ESC system can cause the vehicle to lose control, leading to accidents, injuries, and fatalities.
symptoms: the vehicle pulls to one side

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering system can cause the vehicle to lose control, leading to accidents, injuries, and fatalities.
symptoms: the vehicle pulls to one side

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the safety system can cause the vehicle to lose control, leading to accidents, injuries, and fatalities.
symptoms: The vehicle's safety system takes control of the vehicle
causing the steering to lock up
the vehicle to pull to one side
and the airbags to not deploy.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The parasitic battery drain can cause the vehicle to be rendered inoperable, leaving the driver stranded, which can pose a major safety hazard, especially in unsafe areas.
symptoms: The battery dies after short periods of non-use
the vehicle is unable to start
the battery needs to be replaced multiple times
the battery is drained even when no lights are left on
the vehicle needs to be jump-started multiple times.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The extreme electrical system overload caused by the turbocharger engaging can lead to erratic vehicle performance, causing the vehicle to stutter, fluctuate in speed, and potentially overheat, which can cause a tragic situation, especially in heavy traffic.

Engine rod bearing failure can cause sudden loss of power and control, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded. This failure can also result in catastrophic engine damage, requiring expensive repairs or replacement.

The failure of the FA20DIT engine can cause sudden loss of power and control, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded. This failure can also result in catastrophic engine damage, requiring expensive repairs or replacement.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Crankshaft Position Camshaft Position Correlation Bank 1 Sensor A Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the crankshaft position camshaft position correlation bank 1 sensor A can cause reduced vehicle performance, loss of power, and illumination of check engine lights, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
The transmission leaking fluid and slippage can cause the vehicle to lose power, hesitate, or stall, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: clutch pedal feeling soft or spongy
clutch pedal sticking to the floor
delayed return of the clutch pedal to its normal position
sudden loss of pressure on the clutch pedal.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Defective Throw-Out Bearing and Fork in 6-Speed Manual Transmission
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The defective throw-out bearing and fork can cause the clutch to burn out, leading to complete failure of the transmission, resulting in accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: Loud chirping noise from the transmission
clutch pedal feeling soft or spongy
clutch pedal sticking to the floor
delayed return of the clutch pedal to its normal position
sudden loss of pressure on the clutch pedal

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Engine Knocking and Loss of Power
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The engine knocking and loss of power can cause the vehicle to stall or lose power, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
